toolInventory.newFeaturesCheck: Recommend web search for recent Claude Code updates

processSuccesses: Active use of external code review tools (Gemini, Copilot)
Effective use of worktrees for parallel development
processFailures: Extended thinking rarely used (1 session out of 344)
Large PRs (v0.3.0 had 204 changed files - Copilot could only review 84)
potentialImprovements: Consider breaking large PRs into smaller chunks for better review coverage
Use extended thinking more for complex architectural decisions
Address PR review findings from Gemini (security concern in PR#43, virtual scroll inconsistency in PR#42)
Review if /design command is being used enough before complex features
